content: SXS_2025_09_15 Release Notes Release Date: 2025_09_15 Release Scope: Enhancements Flight Crew Data Model: Enabled the use of the <AncillaryCrewOnFlight> element as a data source. Flight Leg GraphQL Query: Added Flight Bag Plan Info and Fuel models as nested objects. Crew Duties GraphQL Query: Added Crew Layover model as a nested object. EFB Flight Bag Plan Info Data Model: Migrated to a flightId-based structure. EFB Flight Bag Fuel Data Model: Migrated to a flightId-based structure. Fixes Flight Crew Migration: Resolved an issue where, if a flightâ€™s fluid was missing, other flights were not being processed. Crew Qualification Model: Updated Bean Validation rules (the end date field was not mandatory in CAE; validation has been fixed accordingly). SXS crewplanning-c-data-handler-worker: Fixed an incorrectly defined Kafka Consumer. Configurations SXS CAE Data Extraction Topics: Configured partition settings (the partition of the following topics has been set to 5). com.riverx.topic.in.crewplanning.crewinfolist com.riverx.topic.in.crewplanning.flightcrewlist com.riverx.topic.in.crewplanning.crewschedule
